entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm near Lake Ontario. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
